assessment_questions_360.text: How effectively do you communicate vision and goals to your team?
How well do you handle conflicts or difficult conversations?
Do you provide regular feedback and recognition to team members?
How well do you inspire trust and confidence among peers?
How effectively do you delegate tasks while maintaining accountability?
How open are you to different perspectives in team discussions?
How often do you actively contribute to building team morale?
How do you handle disagreements within a group?
How effectively do you collaborate across departments?
How well do you share credit for team achievements?
How effectively do you align your daily work with long-term objectives?
How often do you identify new opportunities for improvement?
How well do you anticipate potential risks and challenges?
Do you make data-driven decisions in your work?
How effectively do you translate strategy into actionable plans?
How well do you manage time and competing priorities?
How consistently do you meet deadlines?
How well do you adapt when project requirements change?
How effectively do you allocate resources to achieve results?
How do you ensure follow-through on commitments?
How open are you to receiving constructive feedback?
How actively do you seek opportunities for learning and development?
How resilient are you when faced with setbacks?
Do you take initiative to challenge existing ways of working?
How often do you reflect on your own performance?
How confident are you in making decisions with incomplete information?
How effectively do you evaluate alternatives before making a choice?
How do you balance speed and accuracy in decision-making?
How open are you to revisiting past decisions when new data emerges?
How do you ensure your decisions align with organizational goals?
How comfortable are you with experimenting and taking calculated risks?
How often do you bring new ideas to the table?
How do you encourage others to think creatively?
How effectively do you evaluate and scale innovative ideas?
How well do you integrate feedback into innovation processes?
How clear and concise are you when presenting complex ideas?
How well do you adapt your communication style to different audiences?
How effectively do you listen and respond during discussions?
How transparent are you when communicating challenges or risks?
How consistently do you share key updates with stakeholders?
